text: <@U03RVAH50TY> I think the API should work fine for GraphQL files if the account has access, does this not work? What are you seeing exactly?

It's been a little while since I looked at this, but I believe I was getting a http 400 whenever I would try a PUT request to *`/cms/v3/source-code/{environment}/content/{path}`*  with a GraphQL file. I can doublecheck that for you later today, though.
If an account is granted access to GraphQL, I believe this should work, but <@UG52C29EE> <@U6GNQ7JBU> can look into the issue if it is not working for some reason
